name: supererogation
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
doing more than necessary: An act of supererogation is an act that is "beyond the call of duty" - it is an act that is over and above what a person is required to do. A man may do more than the law requires of him, and perform works of supererogation.
More examplesFewer examplesFasting is a work of supererogation; otherwise, it would be equally observed at all places and times.A pilgrimage is a work of supererogation; it belongs to voluntary devotion.
